title: Vaibhavam Bangle: Kundan Elegance in Contemporary Design
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base. Features high-quality Polki Kundan stones and shimmering cubic zirconia accents. Expertly crafted with a durable Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: This exquisitely designed bangle seamlessly blends traditional Kundan craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The openwork design showcases intricate floral motifs surrounding each Polki Kundan stone. The secure clasp ensures a comfortable and confident fit. The geometric back adds sophistication. This 'Kanganam' (Telugu term for bangle) is the perfect embodiment of heritage and contemporary style.
colors: Predominantly gold with the clear sparkle of the Polki Kundan stones and cubic zirconia.
occasions: and special occasions. Its versatile design also makes it perfect for adding a touch of elegance to formal events and contemporary celebrations.
description: Experience the timeless beauty of Kundan in a contemporary form. This bangle showcases the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad, combined with modern design sensibilities. Its durable construction and high-quality materials ensure it will be a cherished heirloom for generations. The Hyderabadi Polish guarantees a long-lasting luster. Offers superior value and style compared to pure gold alternatives. This is an 'Adhbutham' (Telugu for 'amazing') investment piece!
